articles.author: Jennifer Maas
articles.title: How ‘Indiana Jones’ and ‘Call of Duty’ Are Pushing Xbox Ahead of PlayStation, Nintendo in a Next Gen Console-Less Holiday Season - Variety
articles.description: For lots of avid gamers this holiday season, there will be Indiana Jones — and then everybody else.
articles.content:
For lots of avid gamers this holiday season, there will be Indiana Jones — and then everybody else.
